microblog.content: There are a lot of cherry blossom trees that bloomed at my workplace! Man, those petals look so yummy...

A little nervous that uploading my art will make storage usage for my site skyrocket lol, but I'll still give it a shot! Worst-case scenario, I'll pay for a supporter tier or even switch to Nekoweb. We'll just have to see!

Monster Hunter is so freaking good, I can't stop playing it!! I won't spoil anything, but there's a very popular monster who appeared in the game, and I absolutely hate its guts! I don't understand why it's so popular!!
I'm so excited for Monster Hunter Wilds aaaa!!! It'll be the very first AAA PC game I've ever played!
Happy belated new year! MAGfest is just in the horizon, and I'm always excited! I'm actually glad it's going to be later in the month, so hopefully it'll warm up if just for a little bit lol.
Square-Enix uploaded a 1-hour version of several covers and arrangements of "Battle at the Big Bridge"! I'm so happy!! "May everyone stay focused alongside Gilgamesh". I sure will!! ğŸ˜Š

It helps to have a sister who's a psychiatrist lol. She gave me a diagnosis and told me that I'm on the autism spectrum. I'm honestly not surprised, but it's honestly a relief to hear this from a medical professional who is also neurodivergent (she has ADHD). While a lot of things suddenly make sense, things are pretty much going to stay the same, and I'm content with that.

My birthday was on the 10th, Valentine's Day has come and gone, and Katsucon was on the weekend on the 16th! It's been a pretty eventful month for me, especially since my wife and I both got super into the Vital Bracelet BE and modding both the BE and DIM cards for our Digimon! I swear we're not obsessed lol.

I swear I'm alive! Things have just been really busy, but I hope everyone had a good holiday! Slowly chugging away at 11ty and I'm not even sure if it'll be worth it in the end! Oh well, it's been fun to work on when I have time. :3

A start to a new week! I had a nice 4-day weekend! I got to see Digimon Adventure 02:The Beginning the night before and I guess the theater food got me really sick. I won't explain too much, but let's just say that my partners and I had to clean up A LOT that Friday... I got a text from one of my sisters this morning asking if I was going to come home for Thanksgiving. I said, 'no' and I still feel pretty bad. Maybe I'll make up for it and give her a call beforehand.

So Ramiel, my Futagotenshi, finally ascended to a higher plane of existence after I turned off the lights before their bedtime, oops. However, that means I'll get another chance to get Sabotenshi! This one's name is Sachiel. Sam and I also started marathoning Digimon Tamers and all the good memories are flooding back to me! I remember telling my sister that my favorite character is Rika, but I didn't tell her that it was only because my sister liked her lol. My favorite is actually Jeri.:3
First day of November and the wind was so cold I felt my entire soul shiver!! The forecast said it would be in the low 40s (F) but this felt like 20!!!
Happy Halloween! I dressed up as Spamton at work today lol. I might watch a horror movie with my spouses, but I'm still way too chicken lol

So Tanjiro turned into Sumiko and I went and reset the device xD I also bought a Tamagotchi Mini for myself and a tie-dye Digimon device for my wife haha. I'm grateful that I can afford these little pleasures for me and my partners. :3

Felt really off the whole day today, and I think it was because of 2Bit passing away this morning.:( I slept all day and when I woke up mostly committed my time into crocheting a watermelon-shaped cozy for my Demon Slayer Tamagotchi. I at least got Tanjiro! Hopefully I can get Nezuko.

Spent the weekend taking care of my Tamagotchi and making a little cozy for him! His name is 2Bit and I hope to raise him into a Maskutchi! I've been keeping track of how much I'm taking care of him since apparently you need to make a couple of mistakes to get some characters. Thankfully, getting Maskutchi means that you can let him be a little bit of a naughty boy while still giving him perfect care! x3

So I just went and bought two P1 Tamagotchis, one for Sam and one for me, haha... The obsession is still ongoing! They should be delivered sometime today, but I noticed that it was about to rain when I left for work today. Hopefully they don't get too soaked!

It's Friday the 13th!!!! Mwahahahaha. I got Sam into wanting her own Tamagotchi! We were talking about some Tamagotchis we raised when we were younger, and she remembered one who she claimed looked just like Bill Gates. Sure enough, her Tamagotchi's name is Bill! What are the odds? We found him really endearing...at least in his US artwork. His JP artwork is....eugh.

Still chipping away at 11ty. It's a lot of fun, but oh man, there's definitely a steep learning curve! In other news, I learned how to crochet over the weekend just so I could make a little cozy for my Tamagotchi. I've been obsessed with these little guys; they're like my new hyperfixation and I don't know how to feel about this lol. I might have to make a shrine at some point, but in the meantime, I'm really excited for the Tamagotchi I ordered that is the same model as the very first Tamagotchi I owned!

Recently modded the mechanical keyboard that came in the mail! And by "modding",I mean just replacing the switches with different ones (Durock Shrimp Silent Tactile switches to be exact). I'm not sure I can do much more than that except maybe use switch films, but eh, I'm happy!

We went horseback riding!! Sam had a fun time, but I was actually pretty terrified lol. The last time I went riding was on a pony when I was six years old. It's definitely not for me, but it was great getting to see Sam enjoying herself. She loves horses so much, and I hope that we can make enough money so she can do this more often.
